description:
Here is Fierce and Adam.

You may have seen these two before, but never like this.The shy and quite Adam decided he wanted to feel Fierce's huge, hard cock in his ass. We, being the pornographers that we are, couldn't let any hanky-panky go on without getting it on tape, so we invited the two over to 'have at it', and boy did they ever.

Fierce was horny as well, which made Adam's tight hole look twice as tasty. Good thing Adam can take it rough, because that's what Fierce dishes out; some serious ass pounding.

Enjoy!
title: Adam & Fierce
